entry.title: Ionization Protocol: Flood Routing
entry.summary: In a message sent on September 19, 2015, Amos Bairn shared a link to the GitHub page for the ionization project's mediawiki. The discussion centered around the possibility of discovering the shape of a network by using k1/h1 probes without actually sending k2/h2 transactions due to their perceived costliness. While assuming nodes are honest, it was suggested that the approach could reveal the network shape over time.
